article.title: Louisiana U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Louisiana U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Louisiana Office Contact Information

New Orleans U.S. Export Assistance Center

(U.S. Custom House)
423 Canal Street, Suite 419
New Orleans, LA 70130
Phone: (504) 589-6546
Fax: (504) 589-2337
Email:Office.NewOrleans@trade.gov

Louisiana Staff

Donald van de Werken

USEAC Director
Phone: 504-589-6546
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:donald.vandewerken@trade.gov

Delilah DeSouza

Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 504-915-3301 (cell); 504-589-6546 (main)
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:delilah.desouza@trade.gov

Brie Knox

Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 504-589-6703
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:brie.knox@trade.gov

Brittany Banta

Commercial Officer
Phone: 504-589-6702
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:brittany.banta@trade.gov

Jean M. Collins

Export Assistance Specialist
Phone: 504-589-6549
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:jean.collins@trade.gov

Reginald Harley

SBA International Finance Specialist
Phone: 504-589-6730
Fax: 504-589-2337
Email:reginald.harley@sba.gov

​Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Louisiana U.S. Export Assistance Center.
